name: Desktop Cat Cafe
storyline:
Desktop Cate Cafe is a cute, idle management game that lives at the bottom of your screen letting you work on other tasks while your cafe runs. Design your dream cafe, unlock delicious recipes, and automate your cafe by hiring cute cat staff!

Design Your Outdoor Cafe

Build the perfect cafe with hundreds of customization options paired with an easy to use building system that lets your creativity shine.

Unlock Delicious Recipes

Progress by serving customers to unlock over 150 different recipes from colorful bubble tea to mouthwatering matcha cake.

Automate with Cute Staff

Hire cute cat staff to take care of the cafe while you're gone or working on other tasks! Desktop Cat cafe sits comfortably at the bottom of your screen so you can always keep your customers happy.

Desktop Cat Cafe is inspired by titles such as Rusty's Retirement and Minami Lane.
summary: Build your dream cat cafe in this tiny cozy management sim that lives at the bottom of your screen! Unlock exciting new recipes, decorate your space with our wide variety of goodies, and hire cute staff to take care of the cafe while you're doing other things.
